description: BIDI mode Phase 12 BLOCKING - get_location with approval flow (SINGLE CONTINUOUS STREAM)
scenario: User approves get_location tool call - Phase 12 BLOCKING mode where tool awaits approval inside function

expectedChunks.delta:
**Determine Current Location**

I've realized the user wants to know their current location, and I have a `get_location` tool at my disposal. It seems straightforward, as it just needs to be called without any specific arguments. The `tool_context` will be handled automatically, so I'm generating a tool call to `get_location()`.
